entry.title: $2295 // Renovated Large 2 Bed - Quiet PLG Block, Steps to Prospect Park
entry.content:
Beautiful Renovated Large 2 Bed Apt - Quiet PLG Block - By B.Q.2.5 Subway
**New Floors Being Installed - 3rd Floor Walk-Up**

< Contact For A Showing 347-563-5554, or naftali@zjamarealty.com

APARTMENT FEATURES:
- Brand new, tuck away kitchen
- Large living area
- New fully tiled bathroom
- Lots of closet space and tall ceilings
- Heat and hot water included

This unit is conveniently located steps from Prospect Park. As well as, close by to some really nice restaurants, bars, cafes, and health food stores. Please reach out for showings, or questions about the apartment.

Phone: 347-563-5554
Email: naftali@zjamarealty.com
